title: Create Smooth Hover Effects
description:
Build interactive hover effects using transitions and transforms.

## Requirements

1. Style the `.card`:
   - Add a subtle shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)
   - Add transition for transform and box-shadow (0.3s ease)

2. On `.card:hover`:
   - Lift the card up: translateY(-8px)
   - Increase shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)

3. Style the `.button`:
   - Background: #3498db
   - Add transition for background-color and transform (0.2s ease)

4. On `.button:hover`:
   - Darken background: #2980b9
   - Scale up slightly: scale(1.05)

5. On `.button:active`:
   - Scale down: scale(0.98)

## Expected Result

Smooth hover effects on both card and button.
hints: Use transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease
Use transform: translateY(-8px) to lift the card
For button, add background-color to the transition
Use transform: scale(1.05) for subtle growth on hover
